marklogic.body: 822kids Surely you don't expect to find rational thought in the Sound rantings on a Cold Friday morning. Gas prices have nothing to do with young people having babies and old people working . . . blah, blah, blah. But "gas prices" is, for many people, a code phrase for everything in their life that has gone wrong. "Gas prices" probably brings on immorality, ptomaine poisoning and measles too. The Morning Sun is doing us all a favor by printing these remarks in the paper so that: (1) We understand better why our society has the problems it does, and (2) if serves as therapy to the deranged so they don't Act out.
